.. _modules_cache:

=====
cache
=====

This module provides two cache data structures:

* :cpp:class:`hpx::util::cache::local_cache`
* :cpp:class:`hpx::util::cache::lru_cache`

See the :ref:`API reference <modules_cache_api>` of the module for more
details.
